content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at (41.0, -82.0)
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5)
Used for mining and storing coal for fuel

### Copper Plate Production at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Burner mining drill for copper ore (x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
- Copper ore storage chest (x=-27.5, y=-59.5)
- Burner inserter (x=-26.5, y=-59.5)
- Stone furnace (x=-25.0, y=-59.0)
- Output inserter (x=-23.5, y=-58.5)
- Storage chest (x=-22.5, y=-58.5)
Used for mining copper ore and smelting it into copper plates

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Burner mining drill (x=-18.0, y=-53.0)
- Iron ore storage chest (x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
- Burner inserter (x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
- Stone furnace (x=-15.0, y=-51.0)
- Output inserter (x=-13.5, y=-50.5)
- Storage chest (x=-12.5, y=-50.5)
Used for mining iron ore and smelting it into iron plates

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Steam engine (x=-4.5, y=12.5)
- Boiler (x=-4.5, y=16.0)
- Offshore pump (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Connected by pipe networks for water and steam transport

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest (x=5.5, y=13.5)
- Input inserter (x=6.5, y=13.5)
- Assembling machine (x=8.5, y=13.5)
- Output inserter (x=10.5, y=13.5)
- Output chest (x=11.5, y=13.5)
Used for producing automation science packs from copper plates and iron gear wheels

### Research Lab System
- Lab with connected electricity
- Input inserter (x=8.5, y=11.5)
- Input chest (x=8.5, y=10.5)
Used for conducting research using science packs

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in container before attempting extraction
- Check container inventory contents using inspect_inventory() before extraction
- Handle cases where expected items are not available

### Errors with furnace operations
- Ensure furnace has both fuel and input materials before attempting to extract output
- Wait for smelting process to complete before attempting to extract products

### Inventory assertion errors
- Verify required item quantities are available before operations
- Add proper error handling for cases when required items are not available in sufficient quantities

### Entity extraction errors
- Ensure target entity exists at specified position before attempting extraction
- Verify entity type matches the expected type for the operation
- Check if entity contains the desired item before attempting extraction
